mapper.insert: insert into ULTAB_WM_MERC_FOOD (ORG_ID, MERC_ID, FOOD_ID, FOOD_NAME, CATE_ID, PRIORITY, UPC, PIC, PIC_ID, PIC_HASH, MIN_ORDER_NUM, PACKAGE_NUM, DESCRIPTION, AVAIL_DATE, AVAIL_TIME_START, AVAIL_TIME_END, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, IS_NEW, IS_FEATURED, IS_SPICY, IS_PROMO_ITEM, OLD_PRICE, IS_JARDINIERE, EXT_FOOD_ID ) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mercId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{foodId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{foodName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cateId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{upc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{picId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{picHash,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{minOrderNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packageNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{availDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{availTimeStart,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{availTimeEnd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attrName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attrValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isNew,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isFeatured,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isSpicy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isPromoItem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oldPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isJardiniere,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{extFoodId,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select: select ORG_ID, MERC_ID, FOOD_ID, FOOD_NAME, CATE_ID, PRIORITY, UPC, PIC, PIC_ID, PIC_HASH, MIN_ORDER_NUM, PACKAGE_NUM, DESCRIPTION, AVAIL_DATE, AVAIL_TIME_START, AVAIL_TIME_END, ATTR_NAME, ATTR_VALUE, IS_NEW, IS_FEATURED, IS_SPICY, IS_PROMO_ITEM, OLD_PRICE, IS_JARDINIERE, EXT_FOOD_ID from ULTAB_WM_MERC_FOOD
